sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO goodsinfo(unq, category, ctgtype, ctggender, price, csize, color, thumbnail, goodsimg, hits, name, sale, info ) VALUES(goodsinfo_seq.nextval, #category#, #ctgtype#, #ctggender#, #price#, #csize#, #color#, #thumbnail#, #goodsimg#, 0, #name#, #sale#, #info# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT last_number FROM user_sequences WHERE sequence_name = 'GOODSINFO_SEQ'
